revision.comment: Fixed Doomworld link that just directed to the main page instead of the Freedoom subforum.
revision.text:
{{doomwiki}} '''Freedoom''' is a total conversion project for the [[Doom]] engine intending to provide a full set of replacement [[IWAD]]s under a {{wp|BSD_license|modified BSD license}}. Freedoom requires a limit-removing [[source port]] to work as its levels are not all compatible with [[vanilla Doom]].
Three different Freedoom IWADs exist: "Freedoom Phase 1" that corresponds to Ultimate Doom, "Freedoom Phase 2" that aims for compatibility with [[Doom II]] and [[Final Doom]] [[PWAD]]s, and finally "FreeDM" which is a Doom II IWAD geared exclusively for [[multiplayer]].
==External links== * [https://freedoom.github.io Official site] * [https://github.com/freedoom/freedoom Version repository] * [https://www.doomworld.com/forum/17-freedoom Official forums] (hosted by [[Doomworld]]) [[Category:Supported games]]
